name: Vibely, Inc.
description: Developer and operator of a social networking platform designed to create communities and make friendships. The company's platform arranges self-organized local events, casual meetups and parties, enabling influencers to increase engagement with followers while monetizing with participation fees and membership dues.
one_liner: Developer and operator of a social networking platform designed to create communities and make friendships. The company's platform arranges self-organized local events, casual meetups and parties, enabling influencers to increase engagement with followers while monetizing with participation fees and membership dues.
